Handles intent invocation packets. Communicates back with the intents.api to operate the in flight intent state machine.

Parameters:

    The resource of the packet that sent the intent invocation

  • intentResource String

    The in flight intent resource, used internally to operate the in flight intent state machine

    The intent handler's callback function

Function generator. Generates API message formatting functions for a client-destination-action pairing. These are generated for bulk sending capabilities, since the message needs to be formatted but not transmitted until desired.

  • [self]
)
Object

Registers a handler for the the event.

Parameters:

  • event String

    The name of the event to trigger on.

  • callback Function

    Function to be invoked.

  • [self] Object optional

    Used as the this pointer when callback is invoked.

Object:

receive

(
  • packetContext
)
protected

Provided by the client module.

Defined in app/js/common/apiPromiseMixin.js:198

Receive a packet from the connected peer. If the packet is a reply, then the callback for that reply is invoked. Otherwise, it fires a receive event

Fires:

- {{#crossLink "ozpIwc.Client/receive:event}}{{/crossLink}}

Parameters:

  • packetContext ozpIwc.TransportPacket

send

(
  • fields
  • callback
  • preexistingPromiseRes
  • preexistingPromiseRej
)

Provided by the client module.

Defined in app/js/common/apiPromiseMixin.js:675

Sends a packet through the IWC. Will call the participants sendImpl function.

Parameters:

  • fields Object

    properties of the send packet..

  • callback Function

    The Callback for any replies. The callback will be persisted if it returns a truth-like

  • preexistingPromiseRes Function

    If this send already has a promise resolve registration, use it rather than make a new one.

  • preexistingPromiseRej Function

    If this send already has a promise reject registration, use it rather than make a new one. value, canceled if it returns a false-like value.

updateApi

(
  • apiName
)
Function

Provided by the client module.

Defined in app/js/common/apiPromiseMixin.js:466

Updates the wrapper map for api use. Whenever functionality is added or removed from the apiMap the updateApi must be called to reflect said changes on the wrapper map.

Parameters:

  • apiName String

    The name of the api

Returns:

Function:

returns the wrapper call for the given api.
